data.name: Rogue Lords - Supporter Pack
data.detailed_description:
It is sometimes so good to be bad that you want to support the Devil himself. Let yourself be tempted by the art and atmosphere of Rogue Lords, including:

• An 68-page Digital Artbook
Dive behind the scenes and explore the origins of the game, the amazing creations by our artists, and lots of exclusive designs and research for the Disciples, enemies and environments.

• The Original Soundtrack
Immerse yourself in the universe by listening to the 18 original tracks created for Rogue Lords.

• The Moonlight set
Get 3 exclusive skins for Dracula, Bloody Mary and the Headless Horseman.

The Digital Artbook will appear directly in the Steam installation directory on your PC. To find it:
1. In your Steam library, right-click on Rogue Lords
2. Click ''Manage'' then ''Browse local files''
3. Open the folder ''Rogue_Lords_Digital_Artbook''

The Digital Artbook will appear directly in the Steam installation directory on your PC. To find it:

data.short_description: The Supporter Pack for Rogue Lords includes the Digital Artbook, Original Soundtrack and Moonlight set for Dracula, Bloody Mary and the Headless Horseman.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Polish, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6750 | AMD Phenom II X2 550
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 650, 1GB | AMD Radeon HD 7770, 1GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

data.legal_notice: Rogue Lords ©2021 Published by Nacon and developed by Cyanide Studio and Leikir Studio. All rights reserved.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains minimal blood, mild violence, crude humor, mature and suggestive themes, and infrequent use of strong language
